desc: Sheepskin Slippers for Adults & Kids; Baby & Adult Mittens & Gifts; All our products are Eco-Tanned, Sustainable, Handmade, Super-Soft and Modern. Gotland & Icelandic Sheepskins; Medical & Baby Sheepskins; Sheepskin Luxury from Ciora Scotland.

layout.text: Slippers to keep you cool and comfortable this Summer
